Przeszed≈Çem ca≈ÇƒÖ grƒô na starym koncie kiedy mia≈Çem 9 lat i muszƒô przyznaƒá, ≈ºe i tak ta gra jest dobra ≈ºe no ja pierdole.

SINGLEPLAYER:
While this game is very complex, it also is funny.
If you pay attention to the story after Portal 1, you'll see that GLaDOS is actually the good guy.
Wheatly makes a friendly impression at the start, but he actually isn't the good guy, in fact, he steals GLaDOS's place and takes over Aperture.
CO-OP:
I just finished playing Co-op with Cocodul3 (i bought Portal 2 for him) and we were laughing our asses off.
I give this game 10/10, not only because it's multiplayer, but because it challenges you mentally.

Update: Me and Coco finished story mode of co-op. It is and it will always be one of the best games
